svg.title: ICE-09: Integration Compound Effects Multiplier Calculator
svg.desc: Interactive calculator demonstrating mathematical compound effects of integrating multiple AI development principles, showing exponential productivity gains through systematic principle integration with real-time ROI projections and implementation timeline optimization.
svg.text: Interactive modeling of productivity multipliers through systematic AI principle integration
1. Adjust principle mastery levels using sliders above
5. Review implementation timeline and ROI data
6. Export business case or optimization recommendations
💡 Pro Tip: Higher implementation levels create exponential
compound effects. Focus on 2-3 principles initially for
maximum acceleration before expanding to all five.
Real-time compound effect calculation based on current settings
Additional $500K annual value through principle integration
⚡ Delivery Speed: 86 story points per sprint
🚀 Break-even Time: 4 months to full ROI
Productivity improvement over 12 months with current settings
📱 Mobile-optimized calculator with vertical layout adaptation
♿ WCAG 2.1 AA | Screen Reader Compatible | Keyboard Navigation
